meanings.definition: A genus of fungi in the family Cyphellaceae.
meanings.english_definition: A genus of fungi in the family Cyphellaceae, characterized by small, cup-shaped basidiocarps and unique arthroconidia.

etymology.value: Derived from the Greek words 'arthro-' (jointed) and 'sterigma' (support), referring to the jointed sterigmata of the basidia.
